The folks over at New Atlanta hae released a beta of the next version of their Blue Dragon server. You can download it by going to the page. Blue Dragon is a CFML server that works in Java and .NET.

Vince Bonfanti demoed one of the new features at CFUnited this year. The feature was the inclusion of a CFThread tag and a CFJoin tag for doing multi-threaded processing.
